name: Forest of Fallen Knights (DEMO)
description:
A top down adventure, with a heavy focus on characters, lore and completing quests. 

Journey to the Forest of Fallen Knights, meet it's inhabitants, fight your way through, and find out why they're there. 

In this demo, you will be able to explore a limited portion of the map and complete a few early quests.

Currently without sound effects/music. Coming soon with the next updates!

Controls:

Z / A Button - Interact

X / B Button - Attack

Arrows Keys / D-Pad - Move

Enter / Start - Pause Game / Open Quest List
